name: Galaxy Warrior 9001
description:
Will you be the chosen one who can defeat every boss in the game?

Let's find out!

This game is meant to be played on mobile,  but you can mess around on your pc with it.

CHANGELOG

-v0.3

Fixed the large hitboxes on basic enemies.
Added a resetConstructor method to set all the values back to original after a gameover, fixes 0s everywhere and no enemies spawning.

-v0.2

Fixed the boss issues, much more fun now!

-v0.1

Re uploaded to fix forbidden 403 error on mp3 files.

Known Issues

-Health and shield mean nothing and there's no powerups

-hitbox for basic enemies is too big

-some users see 0s everywhere and no enemies spawn on restart.

Music by Andrey Sitkov
